entry.title: JET 50390 - 24 Us Gallon (90 Litre) Waste Oil Drain Heavy Duty 350511
entry.summary:
Vendor: JET
Type: Oil Drains
Price: 842.63

[shortdesc]

24 US Gallon (90 Litre) Waste Oil Drain - Heavy Duty

  • Large 90 litre steel recovery tank
  • 78" long drainage hose
  • Tank mounted oil-level sight gauge
  • Convenient tool tray
  • 16" diameter collection funnel holds 18 litres of oil
  • 23" diameter collection funnel adaptor included to expand oil catch area
  • Shut off valve between collection funnel and tank allows fluid inspection prior to draining oil
  • Uses air to pressurize tank, allowing quick and easy fluid evacuation (maximum 7 PSI)
  • Pressure regulator included
  • Adjustable bowl height from 40" to 79" high
  • Uses gravity to drain waste oil from engines, gear boxes, and differentials
  • Shipping weight: 60 lbs (27 kg)
    • [/shortdesc]

    Product Information

    Brand JET
    Product Type Oil Drains

    Extra Product Information

  • 78" long drainage hose
  • Tank mounted oil-level sight gauge
